MM: what are you doing here?
Me: watching you

comments_since_last_sample.body: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!
If you're going with black cabinets, I would either go with no pulls or chrome.  Black pulls would just get lost.
Coming along nicely. Can't wait for the next video.
Push to open
I have push to open in my kitchen and it's not as great as it seems. My cabinets get quite grimy quite quickly

Both push and pull. Push is nice but unintuitive to anyone that hasn't used the cabinets before. Plus, sometimes it doesn't push enough and then you have to pull from the inside of the drawer which doesn't feel as nice
amazing, did you design the layout for the cabinets or download a layout to cut? crazy either way
Make the island wider with a hangover, so you can fit some bar chairs on the far side. Nice when having guests for dinner to be able to sit there and chat with the host.
No push to open, finger prints everywhere. I built a very similar kitchen the hidden top mount pulls work very well. Only complaint about them are sharp edges if you bump or rub against them.
The push pull would be fun! You can always add the finger pulls later

Go with the matte black pulls! Even on black cabinets, you will see lots of finger prints, believe me, Im an interior designer and Ive seen regrets 😅 also, fun fact, those pulls in french, if translated exactly, we call them "cat tongues" 🤣 #truestory

I really like how you mentioned it'd be cool to have YouTube chefs dinner in and use the space! I think this looks like a great kitchen, but it looks like a kitchen designed by an engineer and not a chef. I'd reach out to someone you trust on YouTube and ask them to consult in the kitchen design process. This space has so much awesome potential!
Comment for the algorithm
Your work space looks a lil on the large side brother. I am glad you went for a more ideal iteration.    And great job on this build!
push touch is amazing, i built my new office, with soft touch on the cupboard doors. i love them and that it looks so great not having handles etc. keep it clean

MM: what are you doing here?
Me: watching you
Cat: (off screen) mroooowwwwlll
I’m team matte black pulls on this one. Also not sure about that corner cabinet idea, the moment one thing is on the counter in that corner it becomes inaccessible! Kitchen is gonna turn out great!
I dig the matte black pulls. It'll feel more industrial and modern just like your name! Modustrial!
I had gotten a 48 minute ad, luckily it was skippable, before the simply safe plug .
